org.deidentifier.arx.masking

Class AbstractDictionaryMasker<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deidentifier.arx.masking.AbstractDictionaryMasker<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of data to be masked.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDictionaryMasker<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractInstBasedDictMasker, ReplaceDictMasker, ShuffleMasker

    public abstract class AbstractDictionaryMasker<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDictionaryMasker<T>
    Performs data masking on whole dictionaries of data of type T. The exact masking implementation must be provided in the maskList method.

      Masks the given array of data elements.
      void maskStrings(java.lang.String[] dataStrings, IDataParser<T> parser)
      Converts the input String array to data of type T, performs the masking and writes the results into the input array.

    • Method Detail

      • maskStrings

        public void maskStrings(java.lang.String[] dataStrings,
               IDataParser<T> parser)
        Converts the input String array to data of type T, performs the masking and writes the results into the input array.
        Parameters:
        dataStrings - The array of strings containing the dictionary.
        parser - The object used to parse the data - usually a DataType.

      • maskArray

        public void maskArray(T[] input)
        Masks the given array of data elements.
        Parameters:
        input - The input array containing the dictionary of data to be masked.
